MATEO RODRIGUEZ CUENCA
I'm Mateo, 25 years old and QA Tester with experience in manual and automated testing. I am passionate about learning new
technologies and concepts to make the testing process more efficient to improve the overall quality of the project and help
others achieve their goals. Currently, I am close to receiving my degree, with all the subjects passed and the thesis approved
(pending oral defense) of the Software Engineering degree at the Universidad Siglo 21 - Argentina and I am committed to staying
updated in my field.
